DOC.brief_summary: To compare nitroglycerin and terbutaline for intrapartum fetal heart rate resuscitation
DOC.brief_title: Nitroglycerin Versus Terbutaline for Intrapartum Fetal Resuscitation
DOC.criteria: : nonreassuring fetal heart rate tracing maternal cardiac disease, placental abruption, intrauterine growth restriction, prior cesarean section
